channel.title: Help, Please Much Appreciate Urgent A.S.A.P
channel.description:
Hai Guys, Ive got pearlscape running and i know its on cause i was jsut on but the lag was un-bearable. Not the server's fault in general but i load up client and on my Task Manager its like java.exe 45-58 31k
And the client is fine and up and clean as a whistle but as soon as i click RUN.bat a new java comes up with...
CPUE Around 48-83 And around 25k And the client is so laggy but when i exit the run.bat its all fast again.
Any help please.

item.title: Help, Please Much Appreciate Urgent A.S.A.P
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

Look at some tutorials, ive seen a tutorial somewhere its about lowering client CPU usage.

Read full topic
item.source: Help, Please Much Appreciate Urgent A.S.A.P

item.title: Help, Please Much Appreciate Urgent A.S.A.P
item.dc:creator: @Sp3c_u_k0 Sp3c u k0
item.description:
@Sp3c_u_k0 wrote:

Maybe it’s just the client, try it with a new client and post back with some details on what happens

Mmkay, I Do a new source and CLIENT. And Still laggy the Mem usage is like 1.2k? Its usally 100k +

Read full topic
item.source: Help, Please Much Appreciate Urgent A.S.A.P
